attributes.action: Bring back the comedy and design guru that is, GavinR
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see a total restoration of GavinR, a popular member of the country who is dedicated to offering cheap services to all, a youth aged 19 who has a 4 year degree and who is an advanced speller. A true role model for all youth today.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
